items.sentence: Tom says he doesn\'t mind eating after the children eat.
Tom babysat John and Mary\'s children yesterday evening.
Tom didn\'t know he didn\'t have enough time to do that.
Tom didn\'t know why Mary didn\'t want him at her party.
Tom didn\'t know the reason why Mary wanted a new dress.
Tom didn\'t know when Mary was planning to go to Boston.
Tom didn\'t want to spend too much time discussing that.
Tom didn\'t know who his French teacher was going to be.
Are you sure you did everything you were supposed to do?
Boston is one of the cities that I really want to visit.
Tom whispered something into Mary\'s ear and she smiled.
Tom isn\'t the only person Mary doesn\'t get along with.
Large houses are not necessarily comfortable to live in.
Everyone would be happy if Tom left and never came back.
Feel free to contact me if you have any other questions.
I always wanted to know what would happen if I did that.
Tom said something crude about the way Mary was dressed.
As far as I know, Tom has never tried to commit suicide.
There was a beautiful woman with black hair in the park.
I decided to stop trying to convince Tom to do anything.
